title: Interactive Road Accident Analysis Dashboard
description: Designed and implemented an interactive Excel dashboard to drive data-led road safety decisions.
content:
Turning 307,000+ Rows of Raw Data into Life-Saving Insights üöóüìä

I‚Äôm thrilled to share my latest project: a comprehensive Road Accident Analysis Dashboard built entirely in Excel. This isn‚Äôt just a spreadsheet‚Äîit‚Äôs a dynamic command centre designed for stakeholders like the Ministry of Transport and Police to drive data-led safety decisions.

The Challenge

The main challenge was processing a massive dataset of 307,000 records across 2024 and 2025 to identify critical road safety trends. Raw data is noisy‚Äîso I performed rigorous data cleaning (correcting typos and handling missing values) and data processing to extract monthly and yearly trends.

Key Project Highlights

  1. Primary KPIs: High-impact visibility of total casualties, accident severity (Fatal, Serious, Slight), and the vehicle types most involved.
  2. Year-on-Year (YoY) Analysis: Monthly trend charts comparing current vs. previous year performance to spot seasonal spikes.
  3. Granular Insights: Deep dives into casualties by road surface, light conditions, and area type (Urban vs. Rural).
  4. Fully Interactive UI: Integrated Slicers, allowing users to filter 300k+ rows of data in a single click for instant reporting.
  5. The Tech Stack: Advanced Excel, Pivot Tables, Complex Formulas (GETPIVOTDATA) and Custom Data Visualization.

Data is only as good as the decisions it enables. This dashboard transforms ‚Äúbig data‚Äù into a clear, actionable story
